node.title: Tedesco facing $10,000 fine following NRL investigation into alleged Squid Game incident
node.alt: NRL player walking with his hands on his hips during a match
node.description: Sydney Roosters captain James Tedesco is issued with a breach notice for "drunken and disorderly behaviour"Â after he was alleged to have made a racial slur against a woman, citing the Netflix series Squid Game.
node.content: ["James Tedesco is facing a $10,000 fine\u00a0after the NRL issued the Sydney Roosters captain with a breach notice for \"drunken and disorderly behaviour\".", "The NRL integrity unit had investigated an allegation Tedesco made a racial slur against a woman in Sydney last month.", "It was alleged Tedesco said \"Squid Game\" at the 20-year-old woman \u2014 who is of Vietnamese descent \u2014 when he walked past her in Bondi on October 20.", "Squid Game is a popular South Korean Netflix series.", "Tedesco \u2014 who captained\u00a0NSW to a State of Origin series victory this year \u2014\u00a0\u00a0is believed to have\u00a0told\u00a0the NRL\u00a0integrity unit and the Roosters he was\u00a0talking about the program when the woman and her friends walked past.", "While not addressing the allegation, the NRL handed Tedesco a breach notice, alleging \"he behaved in a drunken and disorderly manner and also brought the game into disrepute\".", "\u201cTedesco\u2019s breach notice proposes a $10,000 fine and that he must undergo education and training as directed by the NRL,\" an NRL statement read.", "\u201cThe particulars of the breach notice are that Tedesco allegedly engaged in drunken and disorderly behaviour directed at members of the public which caused offence.\"", "The NRL said Tedesco would have five days to respond to the breach notice.", "The league was made aware of the allegation last month.", "The sister of the woman at the centre of the allegation made the claims of racism on\u00a0social media.", "\"This may seem like a joke to you, but these are the micro-aggressions that keep racism alive in Australia,\" Katherine Trinh wrote on Instagram last month, while tagging Tedesco in the post.", "\"My dad used to tell stories of the racism he faced when he first moved here 30 years ago, my sisters and I can all recount racism we suffered throughout school.\""]
